InnerGroup.Name: RaceNative Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander
InnerGroup.Description: Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander

Fields.Name: Hispanic
Fields.Description: Hispanic Ethnicity

Fields.Name: LocationOfDeathType
Fields.Description: Type of Incident Location
Options: House, apartment, rooming house, including driveway, porch, yard, garage
Motor vehicle, regardless of where motor vehicle is located (excluding school bus (15), and public transportation (21)); includes motor home
Other commercial establishment (e.g., grocery store, restaurants, retail outlet, Laundromat), including parking lot
Industrial or construction areas (e.g., factory, warehouse)
Parking lot/public parking garage (e.g., parking lot at mall, parking lot shared by four or more households)
Sports or athletic area (e.g., stadium, baseball field, gymnasium, recreation center)
Elementary school, middle school (i.e., K-8) including school dormitory, residential school
High school, including school dormitory, residential school
Public transportation or station (e.g., bus, train, plane, airport, depot, taxi)
Supervised residential facility (e.g., shelter, halfway house, group home)
Natural area (e.g., field, river, beaches, woods) Hotel/motel
Railroad tracks (other than on public transportation (21) or within station)

Fields.Name: LocationofDeathOther
Fields.Description: (If other) Please define. (Max 100 characters)

Fields.Name: NaloxoneAdministered
Fields.Description: Was naloxone administered at scene?

Fields.Title: Who administered naloxone at the scene?

Fields.Name: Delay911
Fields.Description: Was a delay in calling 911 indicated at the scene?

Fields.Name: IVuseIndicatedScene
Fields.Description: Was intravenous drug use indicated at the scene?

Fields.Name: PrescriptionPillsonScene
Fields.Description: Were prescription drugs found at the scene?
Options: Yes, but not prescribed to decedent

Fields.Name: EMSRecords
Fields.Description: Were EMS records reviewed?

Fields.Name: PriorEMS
Fields.Description: Did decedent had contact with EMS in the 12 months prior to death?

Fields.Name: EMS_DayofDeath
Fields.Description: If Yes, was the only interaction on the day of death?

Fields.Name: HospitalRecords
Fields.Description: Were local hospital records (non-CRISP) reviewed?

Fields.Name: CRISPRecords
Fields.Description: Were CRISP clinical records reviewed?

Fields.Name: PDMPRecords
Fields.Description: Were PDMP records reviewed?

Fields.Name: PharmacyRecords
Fields.Description: Were other pharmacy records reviewed?

Fields.Name: EDEncounter
Fields.Description: Did the decedent have contact with a hospital Emergency Department in the 12 months prior to death?

Fields.Name: PainManagement
Fields.Description: Was the decedent enrolled in a pain management program or clinic at the time of death?

Fields.Name: ChronicSomatic
Fields.Description: Did the decedent have a history of any chronic somatic health conditions?

Fields.Name: BrainInjury
Fields.Description: Did the decedent have a history of acquired brain injury?

Fields.Name: LawRecords
Fields.Description: Were law enforcement records reviewed?

Fields.Name: LawContact
Fields.Description: Did the decedent have contact with law enforcement in the 12 months prior to death?

Fields.Name: LawSuspect
Fields.Description: Was a suspect charged in the decedent's death?

Fields.Name: LawLEAD
Fields.Description: Was the decedent a participant in a law enforcement assisted diversion (LEAD) program?

Fields.Name: AttorneyRecords
Fields.Description: Were State's Attorney's Office records reviewed?

Fields.Name: DrugCourtRecords
Fields.Description: Were drug court records reviewed?
Options: Not applicable (jurisdiction does not have drug court)

Fields.Name: AttorneyContact
Fields.Description: Did the decedent have contact with the State's Attorney’s Office in the 12 months prior to death?

Fields.Name: DrugCourtContact
Fields.Description: Did the decedent have a history of drug court involvement?

Fields.Name: DUIHistory
Fields.Description: Did the decedent have a history of DUI/DWI?

Fields.Name: LawProsecuted
Fields.Description: Was a suspect prosecuted in the decedent's death?

Fields.Name: LawCharge
Fields.Description: (If 'yes',) What is the charge? (Max 50 characters)

Fields.Name: DetentionCenterRecords
Fields.Description: Were detention center records reviewed?

Fields.Name: DetentionCenterContact
Fields.Description: Did the decedent have contact with the detention center in the 12 months prior to death?

Fields.Name: DetentionCenterDrugTreatment
Fields.Description: Was the decedent enrolled in drug treatment while incarcerated?

Fields.Name: DetentionCenterMHTreatment
Fields.Description: Was the decedent enrolled in mental health treatment while incarcerated?

Fields.Name: EducationK12
Fields.Description: Were K-12 records reviewed?

Fields.Name: EducationHigherEd
Fields.Description: Were higher education and/or community college records reviewed?

Fields.Name: EducationContact
Fields.Description: Did the decedent have contact with an educational institution in the 12 months prior to death?

Fields.Name: EducationDegree
Fields.Description: Highest educational status attained?
Options: High school graduate or GED completed
Some college credit, but no degree
Master’s degree (e.g., MA, MS, Mend, Med, MSW, MBA)
Doctorate (e.g., PhD, EdD) or Professional degree (e.g., MD, DDS, DVM, LLB, JD)

Fields.Name: BHHdRecords
Fields.Description: Were Local Health Department treatment records reviewed?

Fields.Name: BHPrivateRecords
Fields.Description: Were private drug treatment records reviewed?

Fields.Name: BHMentalHealth
Fields.Description: Were private mental health treatment records reviewed?

Fields.Name: BHBeacon
Fields.Description: Were Medical Assistance behavioral health claims records (BEACON) reviewed?

Fields.Name: BHHDContact
Fields.Description: Did the decedent have contact with the Health Department in the 12 months prior to death?

Fields.Name: BHPrivateContact
Fields.Description: Did the decedent have contact with private behavioral health in the 12 months prior to death?

Fields.Name: BHTreatmentatDeath
Fields.Description: Was the decedent enrolled in any substance use treamtent  at the time of death?

Fields.Name: BHMAT
Fields.Description: Was the decedent enrolled in MAT at the time of death?

Fields.Name: BHTreatment
Fields.Description: Did the decedent have a co-occuring mental health condition?

Fields.Name: BHSuicide
Fields.Description: Did the decedent have a history of suicide attempts and/or suicidal ideation?

Fields.Name: CommunityRecords
Fields.Description: Were community supervision records reviewed?

Fields.Name: CommunityContact
Fields.Description: Did the decedent have contact with community supervision in the 12 months prior to death?

Fields.Name: CommunityEnrollment
Fields.Description: Was the decedent under community supervision at the time of death?

Fields.Name: SSrecords
Fields.Description: Were Department of Social Services records reviewed?

Fields.Name: SSContact
Fields.Description: Did the decedent have contact with the Department of Social Services in the 12 months prior to death?

Fields.Name: SSCrisisRecords
Fields.Description: Were crisis intervention records reviewed?

Fields.Name: SSEnrollment
Fields.Description: Did the decedent have a history of enrollment in public benefits (food stamps, medical assistance, etc)?

Fields.Name: DJSRecords
Fields.Description: Were Department of Juvenile Services records reviewed?

Fields.Name: DJSContact
Fields.Description: Did the decedent have contact with Juvenile Services in the 12 months prior to death?

Fields.Name: HRMORPRecords
Fields.Description: Did the decedent complete an overdose prevention and naloxone training?

Fields.Name: HRSterileSyringe
Fields.Description: Did decdent access sterile syringes?

Fields.Name: FamilyInterviews
Fields.Description: Were family member interviews conducted?

Fields.Name: FamilyInterviewsDetails
Fields.Description: If yes, briefly describe interviews conducted. (Max 250 characetres)

Fields.Name: MaritalStatus
Fields.Description: Marital Status

Fields.Name: IntimatePartnerViolence
Fields.Description: Did the decedent have a history of intimate partner violence?

Fields.Name: IPVRolePerp
Fields.Description: If intimate partner violence is indicated, was the decedent the perpetrator?

Fields.Name: IPVRoleVictim
Fields.Description: If intimate partner violence is indicated, was the decedent the victim?

Fields.Name: DecedentChildren
Fields.Description: Were children of the decedent identified?

Fields.Name: FamilyHistoryOfUser
Fields.Description: Was a family history of substance use indicated?

Fields.Name: SexualOrientation
Fields.Description: Sexual Orientation

Fields.Name: Pregnancy
Fields.Description: Pregnancy status
Options: Not pregnant but pregnant within 42 days before death
Not pregnant but pregnant 43 days to 1 year before death
Unknown if pregnant within past year

Fields.Name: EmploymentStatus
Fields.Description: Employment status at the time of death

Fields.Name: Occupation
Fields.Description: Occupation at time of death. (Max 50 characters)

Fields.Name: Homeless
Fields.Description: Homeless/History of Homelessness
Options: No, but history of homelessness was indicated

Fields.Name: Military
Fields.Description: Current or former military personnel

Fields.Name: SexWork
Fields.Description: History of sex work

Fields.Name: Institution
Fields.Description: Recent release from an institution
Options: Jail, prison, or a detention facility
Long term residential health facility (e.g., nursing home)
Supervised residential facility related to alcohol or substance abuse treatment (e.g., residential treatment facility, sober house or group home)
Supervised residential facilities not related to alcohol or substance abuse treatment (e.g., halfway houses or work-release homes)

Fields.Name: InstitutionOther
Fields.Description: (If Other) Please define. (Max 50 characters)

Fields.Name: PreviousOverdose
Fields.Description: Did the decedent have a previous overdose?

Fields.Name: CaseSummary
Fields.Description: Briefly summarize the case and/or provide additional information. (Max 3500 characters)

Fields.Name: CaseGaps1
Fields.Description: Please identify any gaps and barriers encountered in review. Populate at least one field. (Max 250 characters)

Fields.Name: CaseGaps2
Fields.Description: Additional Gap. (Max 250 characters)

Fields.Name: CaseGaps3
Fields.Description: Additional Gap. (Max 250 characters)

InnerGroup.Description: Please provide any recommendations following the review of this case. (Max 250 characters)
